title: Mashery Rotten Tomatoes API
tooltip: A demonstration of the Mashery Rotten Tomatoes API
description:
This demo App provides a way to see the Rotten Tomatoes API in action. 
It's built using the Intel® Cross Platform Development Kit (XDK). 
The Intel XDK lets you create mobile apps for smartphones and tablets using
standard web languages (HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript).
